links.title: These 6 Top Stocks Reclaim Their 50-Day Lines As S&P 500, Dow Jones Pass Tests | Stock News & Stock Market Analysis - IBD
links.description: Futures for the S&P 500 index, Dow Jones industrial average and Nasdaq 100 edged higher late Monday after a huge stock market rebound during the regular session. The S&P 500 index and Dow Jones rebounded from around their 200-day moving averages.

links.title: Facebook may have been collecting information on your calls and texts for years
links.description: By Facebook has been the target of intense criticism over how it shares data with third-party companies, and the social media giant may know more about users than previously thought. The company reportedly stored logs of calls and text messages made by users with Android devices, the tech blog Ars Technica reported Saturday.
